content: Head to the Verdure Bridge Keeper's Shrine and take the green bridge on the left of it. Head right and drop down the wooden platforms to reach the ground below. Instead of climbing the stairs to enter the village, turn right and head into a webbed corridor. Turn left at the illuminated spot in the corridor to find a secret entrance covered in cocoons. Destroy the cocoons to fight your way inside and find the Puppet Spider waiting for you there.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Puppet_Spider_Spirit.md", within the section "Puppet Spider Spirit" and the sub-section "Puppet Spider Location". The content is presented below:

Head to the Verdure Bridge Keeper's Shrine and take the green bridge on the left of it. Head right and drop down the wooden platforms to reach the ground below. Instead of climbing the stairs to enter the village, turn right and head into a webbed corridor. Turn left at the illuminated spot in the corridor to find a secret entrance covered in cocoons. Destroy the cocoons to fight your way inside and find the Puppet Spider waiting for you there.
